author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: List all open/closed investigations. You can filter results by time range and investigation status.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-list-investigations

commands.description: Gets a single investigation (open or closed).
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-get-investigation

commands.description: Bulk closes investigations according to the specified investigation create-time date range. You can specify the maximum number of alerts to close per call. If that maximum is exceeded a 400 error response is returned.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-close-investigations

commands.description: Assigns a user to an investigation according to the specified user email  address.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-assign-user

commands.description: Sets the investigation status to either open or closed.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-set-status

commands.description: Adds new indicators to a threat (IP addresses, hashes, domains, and URLs).
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-add-threat-indicators

commands.description: Deletes existing indicators from a threat and adds new indicators to the threat.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-replace-threat-indicators

commands.description: Lists all existing logs for an account.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-list-logs

commands.description: Lists all existing log sets for your InsightsIDR instance.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-list-log-sets

commands.description: Downloads logs for from your InsightsIDR instance. The maximum number of logs per call is 10.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-download-logs

commands.description: Queries within a log for certain values.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-query-log

commands.description: Queries within a log set for certain values.
commands.name: rapid7-insight-idr-query-log-set

integration.description: Rapid7 InsightIDR is a Cloud-Based SIEM that detect and respond to security incidents.
integration.name: Rapid7 InsightIDR

description: Rapid7 InsightIDR is a Cloud-Based SIEM that detect and respond to security incidents.
name: Rapid7 InsightIDR
